entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 8. POP 60%
